title: Bright green + black Apple-bubble background and overlays update

requirements.summary: Switch site-wide Apple-bubble background palette to bright green + black for both desktop and mobile/portrait.
acceptanceCriteria: Desktop background uses a bright green + black Apple-bubble style image and retains a similar glossy/bubble look to the current design.
Mobile/portrait background uses a matching bright green + black Apple-bubble style image.
No broken image URLs; background renders on initial load without layout shift.

file_operations.description: Add the recolored desktop Apple-bubble background asset (green/black glossy bubbles) per imageRequirements edits so the CSS can reference it without broken URLs.
Add the recolored mobile/portrait Apple-bubble background asset (green/black glossy bubbles) per imageRequirements edits so responsive CSS can reference it without broken URLs.

Update the global html background-image URLs to use the new generated assets at frontend/public/assets/generated/site-background-neon-bubbles-green-black.dim_1920x1080.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/site-background-neon-bubbles-mobile-green-black.dim_1080x1920.png; preserve existing cover/center/no-repeat/fixed behavior and ensure initial-load stability (no layout shift).

requirements.summary: Update hero floating bubble decorative overlays to match the new bright green + black bubble theme while keeping readability.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section floating bubble overlays match the updated bright green + black bubble style.
Decor remains subtle (similar opacity levels) and does not reduce text readability in the hero section.

file_operations.description: Add the recolored transparent bubble overlay asset (green/black, overlay-safe transparency) per imageRequirements edits for use in the hero decorative layer.

Update BackgroundDecor overlay image references to use frontend/public/assets/generated/bubble-overlays-transparent-green-black.dim_1024x1024.png; keep existing opacity levels/positions/animations to maintain subtle decor and preserve hero text readability.

requirements.summary: Tune the global overlay/gradient so the new green/black bubble background remains readable in light and dark modes without washing out accents.
acceptanceCriteria: Text and key UI elements remain readable over the new background in both light and dark theme modes.
Overlay does not fully wash out the bright green accents; bubbles remain visible.
Background remains fixed/cover behavior as currently implemented.

file_operations.description: Adjust the global background overlay/gradient layered over the bubble background (e.g., theme-aware opacity via :root vs .dark) to ensure content contrast in both modes while keeping bright green accents and bubble visibility; preserve background-attachment: fixed and existing cover behavior.
